feature_1_desc: Start, pause, or cancel insurance anytime with real-time pricing. Pay only for the miles driven.
feature_2_desc: AI analyzes driving behavior via phone sensors or OBD-II device. Safer driving means better discounts.
feature_3_desc: Earn points for safe driving and compete with friends. Redeem for discounts and cashback.
feature_4_desc: File claims via the app using AI damage detection and receive instant payouts.
feature_5_desc: Blockchain smart contracts ensure fair and automated claim processing.
feature_6_desc: Lower premiums for electric/hybrid cars and option to donate unused insurance to green initiatives.
